tweet: ICYMI: the #TrumpShutdown could adversely affect scientific research. Innovation & discovery require sustained federal funding. When @realDonaldTrump fails to lead, we risk losing new medical treatments & new technology that could fight #climatechange. https://www.washingtonpost.com/science/2018/12/28/disruptive-disappointing-chaotic-shutdown-upends-scientific-research/ …

I am deeply saddened to learn that Mayor Tom Weisner passed away. Mayor Weisner led Aurora through a period of great change and growth, leaving it a more vibrant place to live, work, and play. My thoughts are with his family during this difficult time. https://bit.ly/2GHTSv6
Happy #Kwanzaa to all in Illinois and around the world who are celebrating.
Best of luck to Santa tonight as he and his reindeer defy the physics of the space-time continuum. Thank you to everyone at @NoradSanta for the updates! #MerryChristmas to all who are celebrating!

I introduced a bill to close the Congressional gym during a government shutdown. @SpeakerRyan continues to use it during the #TrumpShutdown as federal workers face uncertainty over the holidays. The only task we have right now is ending the #TrumpShutdown. https://bit.ly/2rTIYrP

The #TrumpShutdown is unnecessary. I am ready to support an agreement that funds the government and does not waste resources on a border wall. https://foster.house.gov/media/press-releases/foster-statement-on-government-shutdown …

I am proud to announce that @UofStFrancis will receive a major @NSF grant to support local students pursuing #STEM degrees. https://foster.house.gov/media/press-releases/foster-announces-nearly-650000-award-for-the-university-of-st-francis …

I opposed this bill because any funding for a border wall is a waste of resources that are better spent on other priorities like education and infrastructure. Tonight, we saw @HouseGOP bring us closer to an unnecessary shutdown. https://twitter.com/AP/status/1075919089120481282 …
I’m proud to support the #FirstStepAct to begin reforming our criminal justice system. https://foster.house.gov/media/press-releases/foster-statement-on-support-for-criminal-justice-reform-bill …

Any funding for a border wall is a colossal waste of resources. That’s money we could use to fund new infrastructure projects and new schools. We all agree we need to fix our broken immigration system but threatening to shut down the government isn’t the way to get things done. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1075054037245014017 …

Millions of Americans have access to life-saving health insurance thanks to the #ACA. Republicans should stop their attacks on health care and work to make it stronger. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1073758811318575104 …
Tomorrow is the deadline to sign up for health insurance through the  http://HealthCare.gov   marketplace. Don't miss your chance to #GetCovered!

Six years ago today, 20 children and 6 adults were shot and killed at #SandyHook. The best way to honor the victims of senseless gun violence is to take action and pass reforms that will make our communities safer. Thoughts and prayers are not enough.

This week, I introduced common-sense legislation to allow patients to access their medical records for free up to once a year, removing an unreasonable financial barrier to health care. https://foster.house.gov/media/press-releases/foster-introduces-legislation-to-simplify-access-to-medical-records …

I am proud to join with my colleagues @RepChuck, @repbenraylujan, and @RepLeeZeldin to support the vital work of the men and women at our nation’s national labs. https://foster.house.gov/media/press-releases/foster-announces-bipartisan-national-labs-caucus …

Today, I announce my support for @NancyPelosi as Speaker of the House for the 116th Congress. She has signaled her commitment to transfer her knowledge to the next generation of leaders so that they may effectively lead the Party into a new era. https://bit.ly/2EiB5Uk

We know #climatechange is real and largely man made. The #ParisAgreement was a landmark agreement to reduce carbon emissions and limit global warming. We must commit to protect our planet for future generations.

Our thoughts are with the Bush family as we mourn the passing of George H.W. Bush. President Bush gave decades of service to our nation - from Naval pilot to Commander-in-Chief. America is a better country because of his service & leadership. #Bush41
